description.description: A keyboard that is a reflection of you. Whether you’re seeking a minimalist aesthetic or trying to make a bold statement, the Sonnet has you covered. Visualize your dream keyboard in real time through our live configurator. Thousands of pairings are available right at your fingertips — none of which you can go wrong with.

A carefully formulated selection of finishes designed to integrate seamlessly into any desk setup. Curate your own collection of accents to change the look of the Sonnet. Complement your mood -- or your favorite keycap set.
Beautiful inside and out. Fully-finished internal weights and bottoms — in stainless steel, copper, and polycarbonate — allow you to find the perfect blend of heft and acoustics.

Apakah terdapat masukkan terkait spesifikasi dan harga dari produk?

description.description: The Loop features a new split ring design joining the top and bottom halves together, looping around the periphery of the board for a subtle and elegant accent. An accent strip across the forehead of the board and a solid weight mounted underneath the board round out the refined accents in this board. Loop uses a split ring multi-component chassis design that sandwiches the lattice blocks within the inner ring. The thick top skin of the lattice blocks acts as a force break, isolating the metal top case and ring from each other for a reduction of resonance between the chassis components.

The Mode Loop TKL makes use of the Lattice Block mounting method that was introduced on the Envoy and Tempo keyboards with some improvements based on user feedback. Instead of using retaining fasteners to keep the PCB and Plate from falling out of the board when tipped upside down, Loop uses a split ring multi-component chassis design that sandwiches the lattice blocks within the inner ring. Featuring returns of classic colors and materials such as cream, copper, mirage, and silver mirror the loop will also feature a new elderberry colorway as well as the revival of the black mirror finish.

The Mode Loop TKL makes use of the Lattice Block mounting method that was introduced on the Envoy and Tempo keyboards with some improvements based on user feedback. Instead of using retaining fasteners to keep the PCB and Plate from falling out of the board when tipped upside down, Loop uses a split ring multi-component chassis design that sandwiches the lattice blocks within the inner ring. Featuring returns of classic colors and materials such as cream, copper, mirage, and silver mirror the loop will also feature a new elderberry colorway as well as the revival of the black mirror finish.

description.description: The Loop features a new split ring design joining the top and bottom halves together, looping around the periphery of the board for a subtle and elegant accent. An accent strip across the forehead of the board and a solid weight mounted underneath the board round out the refined accents in this board. Loop uses a split ring multi-component chassis design that sandwiches the lattice blocks within the inner ring. The thick top skin of the lattice blocks acts as a force break, isolating the metal top case and ring from each other for a reduction of resonance between the chassis components.

The Mode Loop TKL makes use of the Lattice Block mounting method that was introduced on the Envoy and Tempo keyboards with some improvements based on user feedback. Instead of using retaining fasteners to keep the PCB and Plate from falling out of the board when tipped upside down, Loop uses a split ring multi-component chassis design that sandwiches the lattice blocks within the inner ring. Featuring returns of classic colors and materials such as cream, copper, mirage, and silver mirror the loop will also feature a new elderberry colorway as well as the revival of the black mirror finish.

description.description: The Loop features a new split ring design joining the top and bottom halves together, looping around the periphery of the board for a subtle and elegant accent. An accent strip across the forehead of the board and a solid weight mounted underneath the board round out the refined accents in this board. Loop uses a split ring multi-component chassis design that sandwiches the lattice blocks within the inner ring. The thick top skin of the lattice blocks acts as a force break, isolating the metal top case and ring from each other for a reduction of resonance between the chassis components.

The Mode Loop TKL makes use of the Lattice Block mounting method that was introduced on the Envoy and Tempo keyboards with some improvements based on user feedback. Instead of using retaining fasteners to keep the PCB and Plate from falling out of the board when tipped upside down, Loop uses a split ring multi-component chassis design that sandwiches the lattice blocks within the inner ring. Featuring returns of classic colors and materials such as cream, copper, mirage, and silver mirror the loop will also feature a new elderberry colorway as well as the revival of the black mirror finish.

Featuring returns of classic colors and materials such as cream, copper, mirage, and silver mirror the loop will also feature a new elderberry colorway as well as the revival of the black mirror finish.

The Loop features a new split ring design joining the top and bottom halves together, looping around the periphery of the board for a subtle and elegant accent. An accent strip across the forehead of the board and a solid weight mounted underneath the board round out the refined accents in this board. Loop uses a split ring multi-component chassis design that sandwiches the lattice blocks within the inner ring. The thick top skin of the lattice blocks acts as a force break, isolating the metal top case and ring from each other for a reduction of resonance between the chassis components.

Instead of using retaining fasteners to keep the PCB and Plate from falling out of the board when tipped upside down, Loop uses a split ring multi-component chassis design that sandwiches the lattice blocks within the inner ring. Featuring returns of classic colors and materials such as cream, copper, mirage, and silver mirror the loop will also feature a new elderberry colorway as well as the revival of the black mirror finish.

We've embraced the symmetric 60% layout, unlocking a unique design language that sets the Tempo apart. The floating wedge effect is achieved by subtly angling the front side of the board beneath the blockers, resulting in a subtle visual illusion.
The lattice block mount affords a dreamy typing experience that can be made more or less soft.
Select from hundreds of combinations to craft a board that reflects your personal preferences.

We've embraced the symmetric 60% layout, unlocking a unique design language that sets the Tempo apart. The floating wedge effect is achieved by subtly angling the front side of the board beneath the blockers, resulting in a subtle visual illusion.
The lattice block mount affords a dreamy typing experience that can be made more or less soft.
Select from hundreds of combinations to craft a board that reflects your personal preferences.

A keyboard that is a reflection of you. Whether you’re seeking a minimalist aesthetic or trying to make a bold statement, the Sonnet has you covered. Visualize your dream keyboard in real time through our live configurator. Thousands of pairings are available right at your fingertips — none of which you can go wrong with.

A carefully formulated selection of finishes designed to integrate seamlessly into any desk setup. Curate your own collection of accents to change the look of the Sonnet. Complement your mood -- or your favorite keycap set.
Beautiful inside and out. Fully-finished internal weights and bottoms — in stainless steel, copper, and polycarbonate — allow you to find the perfect blend of heft and acoustics.
